Others 
========
![Couplet in clerical script](./Image_file/Others/Couplet_in_Clerical_Script/Couplet_in_clerical_script.jpeg)
**<p>Couplet in Clerical Script<br>**
Feb 2024<br>
Ink on paper<br>
120 × 60 cm<br></p>

**<p>Translation:<br>**
The sea of clouds holds the moon,<br>
The river of stars keeps the wind.<br></p><br><br>

![ima_2](./Image_file/Others/Azure/ima_2.jpeg)
![ima_1](./Image_file/Others/Azure/ima_1.jpeg)
**Azure<br>**
Feb 2024<br>
Stitched bound book<br>
150 × 160 × 10 mm (10 pages)<br>
Cyanotype printed on Unryu paper<br><br><br>

![Ad Astra](./Image_file/Others/Azure/Ad_Astra.JPG)
**Ad Astra**<br>
Dec 2024<br>
Interactive Installation<br>
Dimension variable <br><br>

Co-creation with <br>
Chow Haedie, Lau Long Yiu and Ng Tsz Sum<br>
